entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
